name: Snake Eyes (Alex.D.Andr, aVeryDrunkenFish)
description:
Submitted for the 2022 GMTK GAME JAM. The game is a classic Snake game but with a twist. Everytime you eat a fruit there is a chance to roll a dice that changes your input.

HOW TO PLAY

 MAYBE UP

 MAYBE LEFT

 MAYBE RIGHT  MAYBE DOWN

EVERYTHING CHANGES. YOU CAN KEEP AN EYE ON THE BOTTOM LEFT CORNER

ROOM EFFECT

  • ROTATE ROOM TO THE RIGHT

 

  • ROTATE ROOM TO THE LEFT
  • SPEED UP
  

INPUT EFFECT

  • CHANGE LEFT INPUT WITH THE RIGHT
  • CHANGE UP INPUT WITH DOWN
  • SPEED UP

LEAVE YOUR HIGHSCORE IN THE COMMENTS

PERSONAL BEST 1800
